pkgmetadata.longdescription: Plots to help optimising diabetes therapy // The package provides a series of plots to integrate glucose levels, basal rate, activities, events and carbohydrate uptake on a single page in a humanely interpretable manner. It is meant for best-possibly representing the content of a well-curated diabetes diary of up to a week's time or of up to seven comparable days, from which conclusions for adjusting the individual treatment shall be drawn.
